filters.legendExpression: Keys ending with "*" accept expressions as value. E.g.: '${ currentUser() }' or '${ currentUserGroups() }'
filters.legendMultiple: Keys ending with "in" accept multiple values separated by comma. E.g.: `keyC, keyA, keyB`

errors.invalidName: This name is not valid or already in use
errors.FolderUploadError: Upload folders is not allowed, please upload files only.
errors.SystemException: An unexpected technical error occurred. Do you want to send a report?
errors.DoxichangeException: The preview can’t be generated. Do you want to send the affected document for analysis?
errors.NoObjectFoundException: While performing this operation a specific problem has occurred. Please refresh the page in your browser and try again.
errors.InvalidAttributeValueException: While performing this operation a specific problem has occurred. Please refresh the page in your browser and try again.
errors.SubmitDeniedException: While performing this operation a specific problem has occurred. Please refresh the page in your browser and try again.
errors.UnsupportedTypeException: While performing this operation a specific problem has occurred. Please refresh the page in your browser and try again.
errors.ExpressionEvaluationException: While performing this operation a specific problem has occurred. Please refresh the page in your browser and try again.
errors.CmisConstraintException: The following characters are not allowed: \ / : * ? " | < >
errors.MaxUploadSizeExceededException: The files are too large, upload limit is {0}
errors.ContentForbiddenException: File types like "{0}" are not supported for that action.
errors.InvalidNameException:
The specified code "{0}" may just contain the following special characters: !#'()*+-.<=>@^_{|}$&.
Moreover its length should be between 3 and 512 characters with no spaces nor umlauts.
errors.errorSaveTask: An error occurred while saving the task.
errors.taskSelectedNotExist: This task is no longer available and will therefore disappear from the work area
errors.filterSaveError: An error occurred  trying to save the filter, please check the data introduced.
errors.InvalidUserIdException: The user ID contains invalid characters. Only alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) are allowed. Please correct your entry.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.InvalidValueHistoryTimeToLive: Null values are not allowed for history time to live.

process-descriptions.e-rechnung-erstellen: Simply upload a RTF file and get your ZUGFeRD invoice from it.
process-descriptions.kontakterstellung-exchange: With this process a contact creation will just happen if the contact is not already in our Exchange server, thus avoiding duplicates.
process-descriptions.serienbrief-newsletter: Providing a RTF and a CSV file you will be able to send a newsletter to many customers at once.
process-descriptions.mail-polling-service-process: Checks email post to see if there is any invoice to be generated for Fiducia regarding the consultant area.
process-descriptions.rechnungserstellung-fgi: Automatic creation of invoices for Fiducia according to the number of hours CIB consultants invested monthly.
process-descriptions.rechnungserstellung-brewer: Automatic creation of invoices related to the CIB PDF brewer 3 ordered via the PDF brewer web.
process-descriptions.reisebuchungsantrag: Request a business travel and get approval via this process.
process-descriptions.serienbrief-fiducia: Generate multiple letters at once providing a CSV (containing the contacts) and a CWP (containing the content) and send them easily to CIB fairbrieft (per post).
process-descriptions.serienbrief-rechnung-pu: Automatic creation of invoices for maintenance/update projects.
process-descriptions.service-plafo-polling: Extracts from CIB plafo the info about the necessary invoices to be generated, stores them in CIB doXima and sends them via email if wanted.
process-descriptions.rechnungserstellung: Subprocess being called from the general one that deals with a single invoice.
process-descriptions.signing-legal-docs: Ask several employees to sign a legal document at once and manage the resulting documents with those signatures easily.
process-descriptions.signing-process: Subprocess being called from the general one that deals with a single signature action from an employee.
process-descriptions.archivekey-1000: Manages offers, order forms and optionally also data protection documents for consultant services.
process-descriptions.freigabe-workflow: Process started from CIB doXiview to approve signatures in combination with CIB coSys workflows.
process-descriptions.serienbrief-vertragszusatz: Send a mailing to a group of employees listed in a CSV file.
process-descriptions.reisebuchungsantrag-showcase: Request for approval of business trips
process-descriptions.AntragDVMoHo: Applying for mobile and/or home office working
process-descriptions.buroanwesenheit: Allows employees to report where they will be located on each day of the coming week (home office, office, holidays,...).
process-descriptions.crowdsource-freigabe: Allows to evaluate whether a document should be added to the collection of documents for AI training.
process-descriptions.employment_contract_german: Preparation of employment contracts for all German CIB companies, including annexes supplementary agreement and confidentiality agreement.
process-descriptions.anstellungsvertrag-spanien: Preparation of employment contracts for all Spanish CIB companies, including annexes Buen Uso and Conducta.
process-descriptions.spain_demo1-generar_carta_seguros: Create a letter of an insurance company filling out a form. Demo in Spanish.
process-descriptions.spain_demo3-contrato_trabajo: Fill a form and create a contract. You can show the advantages of doXiview, doXisign and sharing by doXisafe or e-mail.
process-descriptions.spain_demo4-configurar_vehiculo: Config the vehicle settings by choosing the model, color and accessories. A document with the details is created. Demo in spanish
process-descriptions.spain_demo5-certificado_empadronamiento: A registration certificate is generated after filling out a form.
process-descriptions.spain_demo7-justicia_extracion_datos: Data extraction and anonymization of justice documents.
process-descriptions.spain_demo8-rellenar_expedientes:
Fill a form and create many documents
Step 1: Fill a form.
Step2: Check the result of the 4 filled documents.
process-descriptions.spain_demo9-extract_invoice_data: Upload an invoice and extract the most important data. Demo in spanish.
process-descriptions.spain_demo11-extract_sensible_data: Identification of sensible data inside a document (name, family name, phone number, email, post code and date).
process-descriptions.spain_demo12-read_invoices_from_email:
Read invoices from an email.
For each invoice a new task is created where the invoice data is shown.
process-descriptions.deutsche_schule_demo_1_beurlaubung: Fill out a form to request the absence of a student in the German school. Demo in german.

policy.title: Password Policy
policy.header: Your password must fulfil the following criteria:
items: must not contain user data (i.e., user id, first name, last name, email)
at least one upper case character
at least one lower case character

emailInfo.title: An email has been sent
emailInfo.header: To reset your password, please confirm the link in the email.
emailInfo.body: This page will automatically close as soon as the email is opened and will redirect to the password reset.
emailInfo.footerBody: Check your spam folder or click on 'Resend email' again.
emailInfo.support: If the email still does not arrive, please contact support.
